text.content:
Split Open

Crit Effect: The target takes @Damage[1d6[bleed]].

Bludgeoning

Send 'em Reeling

Crit Effect: The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Off-Guard] until the end of its next turn.

Piercing

Shattered Jaw

Crit Effect: Until healed, the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Wounded]{Wounded 1} and can't speak, eat, drink, or make attacks with its jaws.

Slashing

Protective Charm

You gain a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.other-effects.Item.Effect: +2 status bonus to AC and all saving throws]{+2 status bonus to AC and all saving throws} until the end of your next turn.

Bomb or Spell
